s0101: Now my lord alone extinguished Zhao clan, state people pitied them, thus appeared turtle divination.

s0123: Zhao clan restored position eleven years, Jin Li Gong killed his grand master three Qi.

Zhao Jian Zi in position, Jin Qing Gong ninth year, Jian Zi about united various lords garrisoned Zhou.
